settings.text: Use code Treat20 at checkout to get $20 OFF
Experience effortless team sports recording with XbotGo, the first consumer AI Sports Smartphone Gimbal. Capture professional-grade action with AI-powered tracking.

The XbotGo AI Sports Gimbal excels in versatile sports scene tracking, automatically following and capturing team sports, it effortlessly covers soccer, basketball, hockey, football, rugby, lacrosse and more.

FollowMe 2.0 uses re-identification tech to identify and lock onto athletes by appearance, body shape, and jersey number. It ensures seamless tracking amidst distractions and can zoom in to maintain sharp, professional footage.

settings.title: Live Streaming
settings.text: Broadcast your game live with ease on our app, Facebook, YouTube, or any platform that supports RTMP protocols, bringing the excitement directly to your audience in real-time.
With the XbotGo App, each user gets 20GB of free storage and a subscription-free experience. Easily upload videos to XbotGo Cloud, powered by AWS, and one click share memories effortlessly.

settings.tab-txt-content1: Elevate your sports experience with our feature that seamlessly integrates live scoreboards into your recordings. Watch your games and events come alive with real-time updates. Plus, when you replay your recorded videos, you'll still see the score change dynamically, keeping you fully engaged.
settings.tab-txt-content2: Our AI patented advanced technology seamlessly captures the game by taking into account the ball's location, as well as the speed, direction, and pose of multiple players.
settings.tab-txt-content3: Stunning High-Angle Shots, You can capturing every thrilling moment from a bird's-eye view. With a distance of 50 meters, you can easily capture every corner of the football field, with the ball chasing and running without the ball.

settings.title: JMTech
settings.text: Capturing smooth and professional-grade videos has never been easier, thanks to the cutting-edge technology packed into the XbotGo. Say goodbye to shaky shots and hello to cinematic excellence! 🎥✨

settings.title: Bighenet
settings.text: Capture every moment with precision and fluidity, powered by the XbotGo AI Gimbal. Let it be your steady companion on the journey to success, turning every challenge into a memorable victory.

settings.tab-txt-title2: It's a really good budget friendly
settings.tab-txt-content2: It's a really good budget friendly way to capture the game without needing to be attending the phone. The real highlight is the accompanying Xbot Go app, which offers various sports modes and AI tracking capabilities.
settings.tab-txt-content3: Tracking Gimbal could be a solid option to track sports footage on your phone. Is smart Ai tracking ability will make sure it captures all the action and the smart app will even let you stream live to various platforms.
settings.tab-txt-title4: Join us as we dive into the
settings.tab-txt-content4: world of videography, exploring the capabilities and features of the XbotGo. This compact and lightweight gimbal offers a game-changing stabilisation system, while sat on a tripod leaving you free to enjoy the game.

settings.testimonial: "I am very satisfied with the product, it does what I wanted as a technical director of the academy, it gave us many solutions in the field of video analysis, of course i 'm still not fully familiar with all its possibilities because I am a new user of the product. Very helpful with immediate responses from the company side to the problems that arose. Excellent job."
settings.author: PANAGIOTIS T

settings.testimonial: "I am a head coach for both a high school highly competitive winter basketball team and I coach AAU during the rest of the year for basketball. This solution is the most cost effective and it gets the job done. I expect to start seeing these everywhere like AAU tournaments and such from here on out. "
settings.author: David B

settings.testimonial: "The kids are running around and the phone just follows around. It's pretty accurate and it's good for the kids to review how they did and how could they have done better. Livestreaming is a cool feature as well.I will buy it again to gift someone else."
settings.author: Jill D
